dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint - DeYoung
dmca.body:
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Sent via Fax to 650.963.3255 Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement
December 9, 2007

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

As the owner of copyrighted material, I am writing to inform you of copyright infringement of that material.

The copyrighted material in question is an article authored by me entitled "Why Rebranding Often Fails". The article, in its entirety, can be viewed at:

http://www.francis-marketing.com/firm/wps/wp-v1i6.htm and at www.marketingprofs.com/6/deyoung1.asp.

Infringing Parties and Sites
The copyrighted material appears without permission at the following sites:

Search Query:	"why rebranding often fails"
Infringing Web Pages:	http://jamalaly.vox.com/library/post/why-rebranding-often-fails.html
http://ajy.vox.com/explore/family/

While the jamalaly.vox site lists a Yahoo email, emails to the address are returned undeliverable. No email address is given for the ajy.vox site.

Search Query:	"galen de young"
Infringing Web Pages:	http://www.graingeruk.com/index.php?option=com_content&task view&id=30&Itemid=36

While no email address is published at the site, the site does have a contact form that allows one to email the company. The form can be found at http://www.graingeruk.com/index.php?option=com_contact&Itemid3

Author's Contact Information
You can contact me at gdeyoung@francis-marketing.com or at Francis Marketing, 124 East Fulton, Fifth Floor, Grand Rapids, MI 49503.

Assertion and Affirmation
As the author of the article in question, the use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the me, the copyright owner, or any agent acting on my behalf. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the article.

Sincerely,

Galen De Young

Francis Marketing, Inc.
124 East Fulton / Grand Rapids, MI 49503-3234
tel. 616.235.1122 / MI 1.800.780.5232 / fax 616.235.2931 / www.francis-marketing.com
